name: VNRequest
desc: The abstract superclass for analysis requests.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new Vision request with no completion handler.

items.name: init(completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new Vision request with an optional completion handler.

items.name: var completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?
items.desc: The completion handler block that’s invoked after the request has finished processing.

items.name: var preferBackgroundProcessing: Bool
items.desc: A hint to minimize the resource burden of the request.

items.name: var results: [VNObservation]?
items.desc: The collection of VNObservation results generated by request processing.

items.name: var usesCPUOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean signifying that the Vision request should execute exclusively on the CPU.

items.name: var revision: Int
items.desc: The specific algorithm or implementation revision that’s used to perform the request.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels the request before it can finish executing.

items.name: typealias VNRequestCompletionHandler
items.desc: A type alias to encapsulate the syntax for the completion handler block that's invoked after the request has finished processing.

items.name: protocol VNRequestRevisionProviding
items.desc: A protocol for specifying the revision number of Vision algorithms.

items.name: class var currentRevision: Int
items.desc: The current revison supported by the request.

items.name: class var defaultRevision: Int
items.desc: The revision of the latest request for the particular SDK linked with the client application.

items.name: class var supportedRevisions: IndexSet
items.desc: The collection of currently-supported algorithm versions for the class of request.
